title: What's the rarest skin you've seen in game.
body:
Curiosity is a pain! 

So what's the rarest skin (you think) you've seen in game. 
I'd say PAX Sivir purely because I've only seen one of them and I've seen more PAX TF's than Sivirs. 

People seem amazed at my Grey Warwick though. 

Regards,
lols

replies.body: I saw a PAX TwistedFate in bronze and he sucked
Black Alistar
Urfwick, Rusty Blitz, Black Alistar.

Urf the manatee

and sailor gangplank
I've seen a black ali. That's gotta take the cake.
I've seen Urfwick
King Rammus
UFO Corki. Saw it for the second time last week.
black ali.
thats racist
The OCE Themed Skin, so rare only ive seen it

PAX Jax x1
PAX Sivir x2

My friend owns the disc for LoL so he should have Black Alistar and I want it so badly...

i seen a {{champion:6}} once

#once

King rammus and Urf warwick

i have only seen 1 of each since i started which was when nami came out

I've seen 2 Pax TF's. One in an Intermediate Bot game (Owner was Diamond) and Triumphant Ryze. (Owner was Challenger)

I'm yet to see Urf Warwick.
Oh cool! I'm yet to see an Urf Warwick!

URF WW. seen one and that was on my smurfs surrounded by lv 10's...
